search.query: | rest /services/datamodel/model | stats c by eai:acl.app, title

| datamodel $source_dm$
`comment("---- Get the _raw ----")` | table _raw | fields _raw
`comment("---- Get spath to extract json objects ----")` | spath
`comment("---- Compute calculated fields ----")` | eval AAA=mvzip('objects{}.calculations{}.owner', 'objects{}.calculations{}.outputFields{}.fieldName', "|") | eval AAA=mvzip(AAA, 'objects{}.calculations{}.outputFields{}.displayName', "|") | eval AAA=mvzip(AAA, 'objects{}.calculations{}.outputFields{}.type', "|") | eval AAA=mvzip(AAA, 'objects{}.calculations{}.expression', "|")
`comment("---- Compute extracted fields ----")` | eval BBB=mvzip('objects{}.fields{}.owner', 'objects{}.fields{}.fieldName', "|") | eval BBB=mvzip(BBB, 'objects{}.fields{}.displayName', "|") | eval BBB=mvzip(BBB, 'objects{}.fields{}.type', "|")
`comment("---- Keep both ----")` | fields modelName AAA BBB | fields - _raw
`comment("---- Concat as one ----")` | eval CCC=mvappend(AAA, BBB) | fields modelName CCC
`comment("---- Expand ----")` | mvexpand CCC
`comment("---- Extract based on our structure ----")` | rex field=CCC "^(?<nodeName>[^\|]*)\|(?<fieldName>[^\|]*)\|(?<fieldDisplayName>[^\|]*)\|(?<type>[^\|]*)\|{0,1}(?<evalExpression>[^\|]*)?"
`comment("---- Render ----")` | fields modelName nodeName fieldName fieldDisplayName type evalExpression
`comment("---- take BaseEvent out ----")` | where nodeName!="BaseEvent"
`comment("---- get nodeNames for source by field for anomaly comparison ----")` | eventstats values(nodeName) as nodeNames_source by fieldName | eval nodeNames_source=mvjoin(mvsort(mvdedup(nodeNames_source)), "|") | eventstats values(fieldName) as fieldName_source | eval fieldName_source=mvjoin(mvsort(fieldName_source), "|")
| sort 0 nodeName fieldName
| append [ | datamodel $target_dm$
`comment("---- Get the _raw ----")` | table _raw | fields _raw
`comment("---- Get spath to extract json objects ----")` | spath
`comment("---- Compute calculated fields ----")` | eval AAA=mvzip('objects{}.calculations{}.owner', 'objects{}.calculations{}.outputFields{}.fieldName', "|") | eval AAA=mvzip(AAA, 'objects{}.calculations{}.outputFields{}.displayName', "|") | eval AAA=mvzip(AAA, 'objects{}.calculations{}.outputFields{}.type', "|") | eval AAA=mvzip(AAA, 'objects{}.calculations{}.expression', "|")
`comment("---- Compute extracted fields ----")` | eval BBB=mvzip('objects{}.fields{}.owner', 'objects{}.fields{}.fieldName', "|") | eval BBB=mvzip(BBB, 'objects{}.fields{}.displayName', "|") | eval BBB=mvzip(BBB, 'objects{}.fields{}.type', "|")
`comment("---- Keep both ----")` | fields modelName AAA BBB | fields - _raw
`comment("---- Concat as one ----")` | eval CCC=mvappend(AAA, BBB) | fields displayName modelName CCC
`comment("---- Expand ----")` | mvexpand CCC
`comment("---- Extract based on our structure ----")` | rex field=CCC "^(?<nodeName>[^\|]*)\|(?<fieldName>[^\|]*)\|(?<fieldDisplayName>[^\|]*)\|(?<type>[^\|]*)\|{0,1}(?<evalExpression>[^\|]*)?"
`comment("---- Render ----")` | fields modelName nodeName fieldName fieldDisplayName type evalExpression
`comment("---- take BaseEvent out ----")` | where nodeName!="BaseEvent"
`comment("---- get nodeNames for source by field for anomaly comparison ----")` | eventstats values(nodeName) as nodeNames_target by fieldName | eval nodeNames_target=mvjoin(mvsort(mvdedup(nodeNames_target)), "|") | eventstats values(fieldName) as fieldName_target | eval fieldName_target=mvjoin(mvsort(fieldName_target), "|")
| sort 0 nodeName fieldName ]
| stats values(*) as "*" by fieldName
| eventstats dc(modelName) as is_common by fieldName
| eval is_anomaly=case(isnull(nodeNames_source) OR isnull(nodeNames_target), 1, isnotnull(nodeNames_source) AND isnotnull(nodeNames_target) AND nodeNames_source=nodeNames_target, 1, isnotnull(nodeNames_source) AND isnotnull(nodeNames_target) AND nodeNames_source!=nodeNames_target, 2)
| where match(modelName, "^$source_dm$$") AND is_common=1 | stats values(fieldName) as fields | eval fields=mvjoin(mvsort(fields), ", ")
| where match(modelName, "^$target_dm$$") AND is_common=1 | stats values(fieldName) as fields | eval fields=mvjoin(mvsort(fields), ", ")
| where is_common=2 AND is_anomaly=2| stats values(fieldName) as fields | eval fields=mvjoin(mvsort(fields), ", ")
search eai:acl.app="$app$" | stats c by title | sort 0 title
search eai:acl.app="$app$" title!="$source_dm$" | stats c by title | sort 0 title
where is_common=2 | stats c as count
where is_common=1 | stats c as count
